2.label: Save state on power failure
2.description: Shut off load (default), turn on load or restore saved state after power failure

4.label: Colour channels
4.description: Set number of channels of LED load - single colour, CCT or RGBW

5.label: Stage mode
5.description: Set stage mode for lighting changes

6.label: Stage mode speed
6.description: Set speed of changes in stage mode

7.label: Stage mode execution time
7.description: Set execution time for stage mode

9.label: Set external switch function
9.description: Enable / disable external switch for inclusion / exclusion
